name: Crappy Skateboard
description:
In Crappy Skateboard you go through three levels to bring your skateboarder back home! Starting underground, with no clue how you must find a hut in which you can use to go upstairs and go outside to be free and go home, in which home, is the outside world. More levels may potentially come.
Graphics Will look different based on monitor
MADE WITH CLICKTEAM FUSION 2.5
